description:
The course will help you prepare for the journey ahead when you decide to tie the knot and start a family. From planning the wedding, buying your first home, maternity to raising kids, we will explore the relevant government subsidies offered in Singapore at each milestone to help lighten household expenses, and make marriage and parenthood a joyous and affordable commitment.

Topics include:

  • Planning your finances as a couple
  • Budgeting for your first home
  • Having Children
  • Reviewing your insurance
  • Bringing Up Children
  • Parenthood tax relief and rebates in Singapore
  • Planning for tertiary education in Singapore
title: Baby and Child Support Schemes
